duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in all areas of the restaurant as needed, ensuring the smooth operation of the dining area and kitchen.
Provide excellent customer service, taking orders, processing payments, and addressing customer inquiries and concerns.
Maintain cleanliness and sanitation of the restaurant, including cleaning tables, floors, and other areas.
Follow proper safety procedures in handling and preparing food.
Collaborate with other crew members to ensure continuity of service and a positive dining experience for customers.
